titleStmt.title: The good man's epitaph briefly explained & applyed in a sermon at the funeral of Mr. John Drury. By Thomas Cartwright, M. of A. of Queens College Oxon, and now vicar of Waltham-stow in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1634-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by D. Maxwel, for John Baker at the Peacock in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
